name: Vertigo (itch) (ShinyTseul)
description:
It's a nightmare and poor Sara can't wake up! It's hard to tell which way is up in this challenging platformer.

This game was made for the first Lospec Jam, though I finished it late, which is why you won't find it there. I plan to polish it further and release a more complete version after the voting is over for that. (I was trying to rush toward the end of the deadline, which is why parts of the level are not how they were planned by my level designer, but that will be fixed this week.)

Controls

Up, Down, Left, Right - Move

Space - Jump

Esc - Pause

Made by: ShinyTseul (me), NegaFruit (original level design concept), SunnyNonna (cover art), BlueTanda (music).

If you enjoy it, please let me know! If there's enough interest in the concept, I can develop it further.
